title:
Software Developer Intern at Pandera Systems
(May 2016 - August 2016)
description: Developed a web Application for the project which enhances the approach to expanding employee skill sets in a fast paced corporate environment.
info:
> Developed a web Application for the project which enhances the approach to expanding employee skill sets in a fast paced corporate environment.
> Developed the application from the Scratch with team of 4 members and released the beta version of the application.
> Worked in Agile Software Development with JIRA tool.
> Implemented Token (OAuth2 protocol) base security using Restful API.
> Created Virtual Machines on Azure Cloud Services through Azure Java.
> Worked on Unit Testing for front end using Jasmine and Karma.
> Involved in various phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the application like Requirement gathering, Design, Analysis and Code development.

title:
Assistant System Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services Limited, India
(November 2013 - July 2015)
description: Worked on development of Revenue Assurance Application for Telecommunication financial project
info:
Worked on development of Revenue Assurance Application for Telecommunication financial project. This application keep track of commission for every activation and employs various processors for different processing activities.
> Developed and implemented the functionalities using Struts2.0 Framework.
> Created and deployed web pages using HTML5, and CSS3.
> Involved in various phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the application like Requirement gathering, Design, Analysis and Code development.
